entries.meaning: Agent noun of promenade; one who promenades.
examples: […]  Claggart's unobserved glance happened to light on belted Billy rolling along the upper gun deck in the leisure of the second dog-watch, exchanging passing broadsides of fun with other young promenaders in the crowd  […]

entries.meaning: (chiefly UK, music) An attender at, or devotee of, promenade concerts.
